title: Chicago Little Theatre, Evening with Columbine (October 21, 1913)
description: Historic program from the second season of the Chicago Little Theatre during which they put on Columbine by Reginald Arkell, The Maker of Dreams by Oliphant Down, and Mr. and Mrs. P. Roe by Martyn Johnson
